content.text:
What employee benefits are most popular in Mexico? A recent study shows that it depends on the age, education, socialization, and position of the person in the company. For example, 68% of senior managers are more interested in private healthcare than a higher salary. However, a majority of employees under 32 would prefer more money, extra days of paid holidays.
More and more companies in Mexico are operating flexible systems where staff choose their own benefits. At Fresenius International Company, each full-time member of staff receives $18,000.00 a year, which they can spend on a number of things, nevertheless, employee benefits include a vast list of advantages, such as: private healthcare, childcare vouchers to help pay for their children's pre-school costs, or gym memberships for those who love sport. Even women may receive 4 months of maternity leave to care for their newborn babies.
Pascual Cruz, the Managing Director of Belfast, a Guadalajara-based company, says most people in his company are young, and they are not interested in pension schemes. Employees usually stay only for three years, so pensions are a waste of money. What his staff often prefer is company mobile, gym memberships, and extra paid holiday. So, the choice is up to you!
